programme.title: America's Day of Terror, 9/11
programme.short_synopsis: Reactions to the terrorist attack on the World Trade Center on September 11th 2001.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on how he and the rest of the American population reacted to the World Trade Center terrorist attack on September 11th 2001.
